name: Neon Janitor 88
description:
Neon Janitor 88 is a game based on the 80's about a city which got contamined with normal trashes, marked with a white outline. Your mission in this game is to collect them all and put them in a machine that makes them cooler than ever. Just be careful! Those trashes dont like humans and it will run from you. 

In each round, you have 5 seconds to prepare yourself.  

The two songs from the gameplay itself was made by Facemelting Solos. We really recommend his work.

This game was made for Dream Arcade Archive gamejam. 

Controls: UPW or UP ARROWDOWNS or DOWN ARROWLEFTA or LEFT ARROWRIGHTD or RIGHT ARROWGRAB TRASHLEFT MOUSE BUTTONTHROW TRASHRIGHT MOUSE BUTTONJUMPSPACEBAR

Any bugs that you find, please tell us and we will fix it. This is our first game jam and first game, thanks for playing and for all the feedbacks.
